pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 28, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, September 28, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

11:40 a.m. The Prime Minister, Ms. Grégoire Trudeau and the Minister of Public Services and Procurement, Carla Qualtrough, will attend the Governor General’s Farewell to Parliament cornerstone laying ceremony.

Visitor Welcome Centre
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks on the occasion of the Governor General’s Farewell to Parliament.

Hall of Honour
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
